name: Nintendo Wii U Hash File
summary: Learn about .H3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You will most likely only encounter an H3 file if you purchase and download a Wii U game from the Nintendo eShop. You may also encounter an H3 file if you dump a game from a disc using a disc extraction tool.
If you dump a game to your computer for emulation purposes, the H3 file will be present in the game data folder with an APP file and other various Wii U game files, such as .TMD, TIK, and CERT files.

description: An H3 file contains an SHA-1 cryptographic hash used to verify the integrity of a Nintendo Wii U game data .APP file. It is referenced by a Wii U game console or emulator (Cemu) and is not meant to be manually opened by a user.
